scripts.dev:all: npm run dev && npm run dev:wasm:build
scripts.dev:wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/wasm -- --all-features && npm run dev:typescript && npm run dev:sass && cp src/wasm/index.html dist/
scripts.dev:wasm:watch-all: concurrently "npm run dev:wasm:watch" "npm run dev:typescript:watch" "npm run dev:sass:watch"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:cli && npm run build:wasm
scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/wasm -- --no-default-features --features log-info && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:sass && cp src/wasm/index.html dist/
scripts.lint: npm run lint:clippy && npm run lint:fmt && npm run lint:doc && npm run lint:typescript && npm run lint:styles
scripts.lint:fix: cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty && cargo fmt --all && eslint --fix src/wasm/typescript --ext .ts && stylelint --fix src/wasm/sass/**/*.scss
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:ts
scripts.doc: cargo doc --no-deps --document-private-items --all-features && rm -rf docs/rust && mv target/doc docs/rust
